538460.name: Lucius Demake - Soundtrack
538460.description:
Lucius Demake Soundtrack. Retro inspired, minimalistic, but atmospheric tunes from Johannes Aikio, that brings up the memories from an early age of computers.
Includes 11 full tracks from the game and a mix of deaths track.

Includes the following tracks:
  • 1 First Night 1:12
  • 2 Intro 2:00
  • 3 Betrayal Johannes Aikio 3:19
  • 4 Dante Castle 3:20
  • 5 Winter Is Coming 2:08
  • 6 Investigation 2:29
  • 7 Menu 6:40
  • 8 Dark Days 3:33
  • 9 Wicked Death 5:16
  • 10 Will They Catch Me? 4:32
  • 11 Socks and Panties 3:44
  • 12 String of Deaths 6:41
  • 13 Got to keep working 4:41
538460.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
